name: Haircut One Hundred
description: '''Haircut One Hundred''' (also '''Haircut 100''') are a British [[pop music|pop]] group formed in 1980 in [[Beckenham]], London, by [[Nick Heyward]], [[Les Nemes]] and Graham Jones. In 1981 and 1982, the band scored four UK top-10  singles: "[[Favourite Shirts (Boy Meets Girl)]]", "[[Love Plus One]]", "[[Nobody's Fool (Haircut One Hundred song)|Nobody's Fool]]", and "[[Fantastic Day]]".
